version_description:
Prepare for a close encounter of the BLITZ kind in the most out-of-this-world update for Blitz Brigade yet!

What’s New:
NEW MAP: UFO CRASH SITE
- Run around a ship from beyond the stars that's crashed in the Arctic.
- Use the Jumpers to get up high in the sky and deliver death from above to your enemies.

A STELLAR ARSENAL
- The Rattler: This rapid-fire energy gun will shock your prey where they stand.
- The Nebula: A cosmic cannon that causes bleeding in any worthless Earthling it hits.

ASTRONOMICAL EVENTS
- Shoot for the stars in a new limited-time event that has you taking out high-flying enemies!
- Keep on the lookout for a beautiful Aurora Borealis in the sky.

Prepare for a close encounter of the BLITZ kind in the most out-of-this-world update for Blitz Brigade yet!

What’s New:
NEW MAP: UFO CRASH SITE
- Run around a ship from beyond the stars that's crashed in the Arctic.
- Use the Jumpers to get up high in the sky and deliver death from above to your enemies.

A STELLAR ARSENAL
- The Rattler: This rapid-fire energy gun will shock your prey where they stand.
- The Nebula: A cosmic cannon that causes bleeding in any worthless Earthling it hits.

ASTRONOMICAL EVENTS
- Shoot for the stars in a new limited-time event that has you taking out high-flying enemies!
- Keep on the lookout for a beautiful Aurora Borealis in the sky.
Medic move speed and firepower optimizations.
Medic move speed and firepower optimizations.

You can't resist the draw of this update, because Blitz Brigade is adding a whole new tactical layer to the fight! Charge more fiercely into battle with the new Resist System and watch your enemies fire with futility!

WHAT’S NEW?
• Resist System: Spend Skill Points to boost your defences from 7 different damage types.
• More Guns: Lock & load with a new arsenal of destruction, including the shield-sapping EMP Grenade.
• New Weapon Bundle: Get a bunch of new guns in one shot.
• Controller Support: Take total control of the battlefield using a Standard, Form-fitting, or Extended controller.

You can't resist the draw of this update, because Blitz Brigade is adding a whole new tactical layer to the fight! Charge more fiercely into battle with the new Resist System and watch your enemies fire with futility!

WHAT’S NEW?
• Resist System: Spend Skill Points to boost your defences from 7 different damage types.

• Controller Support: Take total control of the battlefield using a Standard, Form-fitting, or Extended controller.
Minor bugs fixed
Minor bugs fixed

A brand-new class is bringing the BOOM to Blitz Brigade in this new update!

WHAT'S NEW:
- THE DEMOLISHER: This new class is set to ignite any battlefield with his explosive style, devastating weapons and rocket jumps.
- THE BIG GUNS: Unleash maximum devastation. Unlock new Demolisher guns & melee weapons!
- BOOSTED BONUSES: We've upped all rewards for daily logins, and your progress won't reset even if you miss a day!
- IMPROVED MATCHMAKING: Keep the game interesting by only facing opponents of similar skill.

A brand-new class is bringing the BOOM to Blitz Brigade in this new update!

WHAT'S NEW:
- THE DEMOLISHER: This new class is set to ignite any battlefield with his explosive style, devastating weapons and rocket jumps.
- THE BIG GUNS: Unleash maximum devastation. Unlock new Demolisher guns & melee weapons!
- BOOSTED BONUSES: We've upped all rewards for daily logins, and your progress won't reset even if you miss a day!
- IMPROVED MATCHMAKING: Keep the game interesting by only facing opponents of similar skill.

Here comes the new Blitz Brigade update, armed to the teeth with awesome new stuff so you can bring the apocalypse to the battlefield! What's new?
• HATS: These will not only give you a bold look but also increase your character’s stats!
• NEW BOOSTER: The Shop’s been stocked with a damage-amping consumable. Check it out before your opponents do!
• VIP SYSTEM: Blitz like a rock star! Each Diamond Pack you buy not only lets you unlock in-game goods, but it also boosts your VIP Level, giving you even more awesome stuff!
• VEHICLES: Go cruisin’ for a bruisin’ with rebalanced vehicle stats and improved controls. Feel the POWER and FURY while you ride!
• LEADERBOARDS: Now you can see who your closest competitor is. Take down your neighbours!
• iOS 9 support.
• Connection improvements for Asian countries.

• HATS: These will not only give you a bold look but also increase your character’s stats!

• VEHICLES: Go cruisin’ for a bruisin’ with rebalanced vehicle stats and improved controls. Feel the POWER and FURY while you ride!
• LEADERBOARDS: Now you can see who your closest competitor is. Take down your neighbours!
• iOS 9 support.
• Connection improvements for Asian countries.

Listen up, soldier! Get ready for an explosive Christmas! This update is armed to the teeth and filled with the usual high-calibre Blitz Brigade goodness:

• BATTLE WAR MACHINE: Here comes your personal vehicle of destruction!
• NEW VEHICLES: New TANKS and HELICOPTERS to fill your season with merriment and mayhem!
• XMAS WEAPONS: Spread the joy with holiday-themed instruments of demolition!
• HOLIDAY HATS: You will love them!
• DEMOLISHER: Rebalanced to fit the game better!

Merry Blitzmas to all!

Merry Blitzmas to all!

•NEW GUNS: Even more ways to blow foes away.

•DIVISION SYSTEM Added:
▶ Improved Matchmaking so you'll play more rivals around your level!
▶ The weapons you own are now a key factor in determining the opponents you'll face and the Division you're in.
▶ Earn higher Division Points and Player Ranks for your heroic performances in battle!
▶ Reach first place in the Division to earn special rewards!

•IMPROVED UI: More polished for smooth navigation through all of the new features.

•NEW GUNS: Even more ways to blow foes away.

•DIVISION SYSTEM Added:
▶ Improved Matchmaking so you'll play more rivals around your level!
▶ The weapons you own are now a key factor in determining the opponents you'll face and the Division you're in.
▶ Earn higher Division Points and Player Ranks for your heroic performances in battle!
▶ Reach first place in the Division to earn special rewards!

•IMPROVED UI: More polished for smooth navigation through all of the new features.

FREE-FOR-ALL MODE
Play as whoever you want in 6-player carnage. No teams. No mercy. Just choose your weapon and frag them all!

FURIOUS FIREPOWER
Bust open the newly updated arsenal to find the best boomstick for the job!

HOMEBREWED HATS
We asked the community for some snazzy hat ideas, and you really answered the call! Now you can wear the winning designs in-game and feel like a winner yourself.

3D TOUCH SUPPORT
Tactically move and shoot with even greater ease on iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus.

WEAPON UPGRADES: Collect Fusion cards and unlock amazing boosts and perks to wreck your rivals!

CARD CRATES: Crack open a crate of smackdown! Get Boxes to obtain Fusion Cards!

NEW-AGE ARSENAL: Grab the latest primary and secondary weapons, including a futuristic set of sci-fi firepower.

MYSTERY BUNDLE: Try your luck with the new Bundle and get a great bargain for 3 of the best items in our vault!

BALANCE CHANGES: Decreased Medic's speed, removed Cupid Commando's concussions, rebalanced Sick Surprise & more. Check out our social pages or newsfeed for more information.

WEAPON UPGRADES: Collect Fusion cards and unlock amazing boosts and perks to wreck your rivals!

CARD CRATES: Crack open a crate of smackdown! Get Boxes to obtain Fusion Cards!

NEW-AGE ARSENAL: Grab the latest primary and secondary weapons, including a futuristic set of sci-fi firepower.

MYSTERY BUNDLE: Try your luck with the new Bundle and get a great bargain for 3 of the best items in our vault!

BALANCE CHANGES: Decreased Medic's speed, removed Cupid Commando's concussions, rebalanced Sick Surprise & more. Check out our social pages or newsfeed for more information.

ULTRA ABILITIES: The battle is ramping up again! Every class now has a unique Ultra Ability that you can use to completely turn the tide of battle -- or put the last nail in your enemy's coffin!

NEW WEAPONS: Get a load of new guns to tear through your foes.

REPLAYKIT SUPPORT FOR iOS 9: Record your best kills, awesome escapes and team carnage with the push of a button! Add commentary, edit your clips and post them online with ease!

ULTRA ABILITIES: The battle is ramping up again! Every class now has a unique Ultra Ability that you can use to completely turn the tide of battle -- or put the last nail in your enemy's coffin!

NEW WEAPONS: Get a load of new guns to tear through your foes.

REPLAYKIT SUPPORT FOR iOS 9: Record your best kills, awesome escapes and team carnage with the push of a button! Add commentary, edit your clips and post them online with ease!

THE BIGGEST UPDATE THIS YEAR!

NEW CLASS: Dish out automated annihilation with the brigade's first female trooper! The Engineer can build turrets that add new strategies to combat. She can also deal the pain personally with her awesome arsenal!

SHATTER YOUR LIMITS: Unlock new heights of power with Unchained levels -- only for players level 120 and up!

IMPROVED UI: Updated menus and controls make it easier to get into the action.

MESSAGE STICKERS: Really blow up your next text with some exclusive Blitz Brigade character emojis.

BROADCAST THE BLITZ: Now you can livestream your battles using ReplayKit!

GAMEPLAY BALANCE IMPROVEMENTS: More info on our social pages.

THE BIGGEST UPDATE THIS YEAR!

NEW CLASS: Dish out automated annihilation with the brigade's first female trooper! The Engineer can build turrets that add new strategies to combat. She can also deal the pain personally with her awesome arsenal!

SHATTER YOUR LIMITS: Unlock new heights of power with Unchained levels -- only for players level 120 and up!

IMPROVED UI: Updated menus and controls make it easier to get into the action.

MESSAGE STICKERS: Really blow up your next text with some exclusive Blitz Brigade character emojis.

BROADCAST THE BLITZ: Now you can livestream your battles using ReplayKit!

GAMEPLAY BALANCE IMPROVEMENTS: More info on our social pages.

It's the most wonderful time of year... to blow stuff up! And the winter update is making the holidays extra special with a seasonal arsenal, and cool festive apparel.

- Spread some holiday fear with these seasonally themed WEAPONS sure to put you on the naughty list.

- Drop a frosty surprise with the new GRENADE!

- Get yourself some new holiday HATS for the most festive fight of your life!

- Even better balanced gameplay: Check out our social media pages for more info.

- Get yourself some new holiday HATS for the most festive fight of your life!

- Even better balanced gameplay: Check out our social media pages for more info.

Get ready for Update 18, fully loaded with plenty of guns and fun!

- The girls have a new best friend: The GATEKEEPER turret! A durable, area-damaging tool of destruction for Engineers!
- Bombard your enemy with the Gunner's BIG BERTHA cannon!
- Pull off historic one-shot kills with the Sniper's MINUTEMAN MUSKET.
- Arm all your troops with new UNIFIED WEAPONS and look like a proper soldier with awesome new HATS.

Get ready for Update 18, fully loaded with plenty of guns and fun!

- The girls have a new best friend: The GATEKEEPER turret! A durable, area-damaging tool of destruction for Engineers!
- Bombard your enemy with the Gunner's BIG BERTHA cannon!
- Pull off historic one-shot kills with the Sniper's MINUTEMAN MUSKET.
- Arm all your troops with new UNIFIED WEAPONS and look like a proper soldier with awesome new HATS.

Play Blitz Brigade anywhere with the release of Update 19!

- 3G/LTE support added. Break the shackles of Wi-Fi range!
- Extended the Engineer's inventory: Swap turrets on the go!
- Indulge your inner kid with the STALLION STEEL melee weapon.
- Share the joy with GREAT SMILE, a new weapon for Gunners and Demolishers.
- Help your enemies lie down with FIST AID, a new Medic-class weapon.
- Lots of additional improvements and NEW GUNS.

Play Blitz Brigade anywhere with the release of Update 19!

- 3G/LTE support added. Break the shackles of Wi-Fi range!
- Extended the Engineer's inventory: Swap turrets on the go!
- Indulge your inner kid with the STALLION STEEL melee weapon.
- Share the joy with GREAT SMILE, a new weapon for Gunners and Demolishers.
- Help your enemies lie down with FIST AID, a new Medic-class weapon.
- Lots of additional improvements and NEW GUNS.

Update 20 is here – featuring chat support, new weapons, and… zombies?!

- CHAT SUPPORT: For the first time ever, type to your teammates in the squad chat, and say hello to strangers in the global chat!
- ZOMBIE MODE: Find the antidote and fight off countless zombies in this brand-new 3-player co-op mode!
- NEW POWERFUL WEAPONS: For Medic, Soldier, Sniper, Stealth, Demolisher, and Engineer classes.
- ADDITIONAL IMPROVEMENTS: New Loadout screen and minor UI flow rework.

Update 20 is here – featuring chat support, new weapons, and… zombies?!

- CHAT SUPPORT: For the first time ever, type to your teammates in the squad chat, and say hello to strangers in the global chat!
- ZOMBIE MODE: Find the antidote and fight off countless zombies in this brand-new 3-player co-op mode!
- NEW POWERFUL WEAPONS: For Medic, Soldier, Sniper, Stealth, Demolisher, and Engineer classes.
- ADDITIONAL IMPROVEMENTS: New Loadout screen and minor UI flow rework.
Minor bugs fixed
Minor bugs fixed

WHAT'S NEW!
- BIG PILE OF GUNS. Six new awesome weapons—including a spinner for the trendiest players!
- REVENGE OFFER. Get discounted items in case of death in competitive and co-op modes.
- LOTS OF UI IMPROVEMENTS. New main menu, improved friends list, ability to check items that are present in the bundle and lots of other improvements.
- MORE REWARDS FOR EVENTS. Play the game to get them!

- MORE REWARDS FOR EVENTS. Play the game to get them!
Minor bugs fixed
Minor bugs fixed

Prepare for a close encounter of the BLITZ kind -- in the most out-of-this-world Blitz Brigade update yet!

ALL-OUT ALIEN APOCALYPSE!
Extraterrestrial invaders are threatening our world with magma-powered DEATH BEAMS… And only YOU can save it! Recruit a 3-soldier squad to fight back against the UFO menace in the ALL-NEW PvE game mode. Go, Earthlings, go!
ALIEN-ERADICATING ITEMS
Grab 5 new UFO-huntin’ weapons and 1 new hat for established Earth defenders!

Prepare for a close encounter of the BLITZ kind -- in the most out-of-this-world Blitz Brigade update yet!

ALL-OUT ALIEN APOCALYPSE!
Extraterrestrial invaders are threatening our world with magma-powered DEATH BEAMS… And only YOU can save it! Recruit a 3-soldier squad to fight back against the UFO menace in the ALL-NEW PvE game mode. Go, Earthlings, go!
ALIEN-ERADICATING ITEMS
Grab 5 new UFO-huntin’ weapons and 1 new hat for established Earth defenders!

Spread some holiday fear to your frenemies – blast them with weapons from our all-new arsenal!

Make your foes comfy, cosy, and toasty with the FLAME CANNON! Light up their hearts with a precise LASER SPEAR shot! Show them how much you care with some help from the HOLLY JOLLY KILLMAS melee weapon! If you’re not one for fancy salutations, then greet the enemy team with a good ol’ fashioned volley of bullets from the PUNCHER machine gun or BLISTERBLAZE assault rifle!

Spread some holiday fear to your frenemies – blast them with weapons from our all-new arsenal!

Make your foes comfy, cosy, and toasty with the FLAME CANNON! Light up their hearts with a precise LASER SPEAR shot! Show them how much you care with some help from the HOLLY JOLLY KILLMAS melee weapon! If you’re not one for fancy salutations, then greet the enemy team with a good ol’ fashioned volley of bullets from the PUNCHER machine gun or BLISTERBLAZE assault rifle!

VEHICLES FOR ALL: We're changing how vehicles are deployed by introducing Vehicle Tickets. Just redeem your tickets at a vehicle spawning station and begin the barrage!
INTRODUCING SUPPLY CRATES: Get consumable items and Vehicle Tickets in packs of 3 with these Crates that you can buy for Coins.
FREE CRATES DAILY: Claim a free Crate every 8 hours, or watch an ad for a chance at a weapon!
5 NEW GUNS: Wield the Weeping Widow, Waster, Gatorjaw, Lead Belly and Medi-Bow now!

Superheroes are everywhere! You read about them in comics, see them in movies, and now superhero content is flying its way into Blitz Brigade!
ZORK INVASION!
When interstellar aliens invaded Earth, all hope seemed lost. But Blitz Brigadiers saw their guns suddenly charged with strange powers. United by a common foe, they now stand together in a new themed boss fight mode!

BECOME A HERO... WITH A GUN
In this time of need, heroes with 5 new super-powered weapons will rise to defend Earth!
